tool_description: Calculates accumulated growing degree days (GDD) and heat units for crop development based on temperature thresholds and crop requirements.

daily_min_temps.description: Array of daily minimum temperatures in Celsius

daily_max_temps.description: Array of daily maximum temperatures in Celsius

base_temperature.description: Base temperature threshold for crop growth in Celsius

upper_threshold.description: Upper temperature threshold above which growth stops

error_messages: Temperature array mismatch: Daily minimum and maximum temperature arrays must have the same length.
Invalid temperature values: Maximum temperatures must be greater than or equal to minimum temperatures.
Invalid base temperature: Base temperature must be between 0 and 25°C.
Invalid upper threshold: Upper threshold must be greater than base temperature and less than 50°C.
Insufficient data: Need at least 1 day of temperature data.
usage: Provide arrays of daily minimum and maximum temperatures along with crop-specific base temperature. Optional upper threshold caps excessive heat. Returns cumulative growing degree days.

daily_gdd.description: Growing degree days for each day

average_daily_gdd.description: Average GDD per day over the period

effective_growing_days.description: Number of days with positive GDD accumulation
